de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment

Class PaySharedSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.AbstractSession
      • de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PaySharedSession

  • public class PaySharedSession
extends AbstractSession
    Project: LUIS ePayment

    PaySharedSession is used only in a LUIS ePayment SharedTerminalServer environment. It substitues the class PaySession and is needed for clients to contact the SharedTerminalServer.

    Version:
    $Revision: 1.6 $
    Author:
    M. Gelfort
    See Also:
    PaySession

    • Constructor Detail

      • PaySharedSession

        public PaySharedSession()
        Constructor to create a PaySharedSession instance.

        In a LUIS ePayment standalone installation, this class is never used. In a LUIS ePayment SharedTerminalServer this class substitutes the class PaySession. The methods are similar to that class, but added with a TID string parameter. This parameter defines the terminalID of the eft device, the client wants to connect to.

        See Also:
        PaySession

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public PayTerminal login(PayConfiguration config,
                         java.lang.String tid)
                  throws PayException
        See the method PaySession.login(PayConfiguration) for a detailed description.
        Parameters:
        config - An instance of a PayConfiguration object or file. This instance must have the following parameters set:
        • sharedTerminalIP PayConfiguration.setSharedTerminalIP(String)
        • sharedterminalPort PayConfiguration.setSharedTerminalPort(int)
        Optional are the following entries:
        • logfile PayConfiguration.setLogfile(String)
        • simulation PayConfiguration.setSimulation(boolean)
        tid - The terminalID of the device, where to logon.
        Returns:
        An instance of PayTerminal, if successfully logged on.
        Throws:
        PayException
        See Also:
        PaySession.login(PayConfiguration)
